Package genshi :: Module builder :: Class Fragment

Class Fragment

object --+
         |
        Fragment
Known Subclasses:
  • Element
Represents a markup fragment, which is basically just a list of element or text nodes.

Stream
generate(self)
Return a markup event stream for the fragment.
